Name: Border Control
About the game: Defend America from murderous zombie hordes, waves of unwashed orcs, and the military strength of enemy nations all bent on the destruction of the homeland. unrelenting wave-based combat requiring skill, speed and plenty of ammo pickups to overcome the onsalught of enemies. Battle across six maps with a variety of enemies and enemy types Repel hostile invaders with an arsenal of weaponry fit for a border guard and take back control of the border. Check out all the latest border news at the Border Control Game Youtube Channel!
Meta Title: Border Control: Mar 6, 2019, TOG and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Border Control? Check out the release date (Mar 6, 2019), developer insights from TOG, and a complete game summary.
